The arrested are A. Ç., 38, E. T., 21, F. M., 23, M. K. 28, B. T. 38, and B. N., 38. Citizens E. Sh., 35, and A. Sh. 29 are suspected of the criminal offenses of 'Fraudulent pyramid schemes' and 'Computer fraud'.
